section.title: Migrating between GWT face 1.10.0 and Geomajas GWT face 1.11.0

listitem.para: Default zoom behaviour for zooming to a selected point has changed: before it was keeping the current scale, now it zooms to the maximum scale (by default). The zoom scale for zooming to points can be changed on a per-layer level by assigning the zoomToPointScale property in ClientLayerInfo.

section.title: Migrating between GWT face 1.11.0 and Geomajas GWT face 1.12.0

listitem.para: The smartgwt version has upgraded from 2.5 to 3.1. There is a backwards compatibility issue in smartgwt 3.0, see http://www.smartclient.com/smartgwt/release_notes.html#3_0. Although we re-introduced CloseClientEvent as deprecated, you might run into problems with CloseClientHandler.
